title: Provides for a financial consumer bill of rights to make consumers aware of where and how to file complaints when not satisfied with the service provided by the bank
summary: Provides for a financial consumer bill of rights to make consumers aware of where and how to file complaints when not satisfied with the service provided by a banking institution; requires posting within public areas of banking institutions the NYS banking department's hotline telephone number and the rights of account holders; directs the superintendent to promulgate the contents of notice.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the banking law, in relation to a financial consumer bill of rights
